metaData.label: GP-PHARMA
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal General Medicine OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pharmacist Other

metaData.label: SP (PNEUMO+GERIATRICS)
metaData.criteriaDescription: SPECIALTY_1 equal Geriatrics OR ( SPECIALTY_1 equal Internal Medicine AND SPECIALTY_2 equal Geriatrics ) OR ( SPECIALTY_1 equal Medical Assistant AND SPECIALTY_2 equal Geriatrics ) OR SPECIALTY_1 equal Pneumology OR ( SPECIALTY_1 equal Internal Medicine AND SPECIALTY_2 equal Pneumology ) OR ( SPECIALTY_1 equal Medical Assistant AND SPECIALTY_2 equal Pneumology )

metaData.label: nl-BE
metaData.criteriaDescription: language equal nl-be AND ( brick2 is not equal UG1.WBE.01000 OR brick2 is null  )
